name: Doomscreech

skills.name: Scrabbling Claws
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 25% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK] [HP]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Damage +10%

skills.name: Warning Screech
skills.raw_description:
Fills the Turn Meter of all allies by 30%. Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Shelter
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Places a [Shield] buff equal to 30% MAX HP on this Champion for 2 turns. Damage increases according to this Champion's current HP.
Damage based on: [HP]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
